info.title: idocs api document
info.description:
Use the inquireVaulting API to inquire about the vaulting status of a payment method.  

Structure

A message consists of a header and body. The following sections are focused on the body structure. For the header structure, see:

  • Request header
  • Response header 

Note: Set the data type of each field (except array) as String. This means that you must use double quotation marks (" ") to enclose the field value. Examples:

  • If the data type of a field is Integer and its value is 20, set it as "20".
  • If the data type of a field is Boolean and its value is true, set it as "true".
info.descriptionLake:
Use the inquireVaulting API to inquire about the vaulting status of a payment method.  

Structure

A message consists of a header and body. The following sections are focused on the body structure. For the header structure, see:

  • Request header
  • Response header 

Note: Set the data type of each field (except array) as String. This means that you must use double quotation marks (" ") to enclose the field value. Examples:

  • If the data type of a field is Integer and its value is 20, set it as "20".
  • If the data type of a field is Boolean and its value is true, set it as "true".

vaultingRequestId.description:
The unique ID that is assigned by a merchant to identify a card vaulting request.

More information about this field

  • This field is an API idempotency field. For vaulting requests that are initiated with the same value of vaultingRequestId and reach a final status of S or F, the same result is to be returned for the request.
vaultingRequestId.descriptionLake:
The unique ID that is assigned by a merchant to identify a card vaulting request.

More information about this field

  • This field is an API idempotency field. For vaulting requests that are initiated with the same value of vaultingRequestId and reach a final status of S or F, the same result is to be returned for the request.

resultCode.description: The result code. The possible result codes are listed in the Result/Error codes table on this page.
resultCode.descriptionLake: The result code. The possible result codes are listed in the Result/Error codes table on this page.

resultStatus.description:
Result status. Valid values are:

  • S: Indicates that this API is called successfully.
  • F: Indicates that this API call is failed.
  • U: Indicates that the calling status of this API is unknown.
resultStatus.descriptionLake:
Result status. Valid values are:

  • S: Indicates that this API is called successfully.
  • F: Indicates that this API call is failed.
  • U: Indicates that the calling status of this API is unknown.

resultMessage.description: Result message that explains the result code.
resultMessage.descriptionLake: Result message that explains the result code.

result.description:
Information about the request calling result. 

This field does not indicate the vaulting result. This field only indicates whether this interface is called successfully.
result.descriptionLake:
Information about the request calling result. 

This field does not indicate the vaulting result. This field only indicates whether this interface is called successfully.

vaultingRequestId.description: The unique ID that is assigned by a merchant to identify a card vaulting request.
vaultingRequestId.descriptionLake: The unique ID that is assigned by a merchant to identify a card vaulting request.

normalUrl.description:
The URL that redirects users to a WAP or WEB page in the default browser or the embedded WebView.

When the value of result.resultStatus is S and the value of vaultingStatus is PROCESSING, one or more of the following URLs may be returned: schemeUrl, applinkUrl, and normalUrl.   

When the value of paymentMethodType is CARD, the user is required to complete the 3DS authentication on the page accessed through this URL.
normalUrl.descriptionLake:
The URL that redirects users to a WAP or WEB page in the default browser or the embedded WebView.

When the value of result.resultStatus is S and the value of vaultingStatus is PROCESSING, one or more of the following URLs may be returned: schemeUrl, applinkUrl, and normalUrl.   

When the value of paymentMethodType is CARD, the user is required to complete the 3DS authentication on the page accessed through this URL.

schemeUrl.description:
The URL scheme that redirects users to open an App in an Android or iOS system when the target App is installed.

When the value of result.resultStatus is S and the value of vaultingStatus is PROCESSING, one or more of the following URLs may be returned: schemeUrl, applinkUrl, and normalUrl.
schemeUrl.descriptionLake:
The URL scheme that redirects users to open an App in an Android or iOS system when the target App is installed.

When the value of result.resultStatus is S and the value of vaultingStatus is PROCESSING, one or more of the following URLs may be returned: schemeUrl, applinkUrl, and normalUrl.

applinkUrl.description:
The URL that redirects users to open an app when the target app is installed, or to open a WAP page when the target app is not installed. For Android, the URL is a Native App Link. For iOS, the URL is a Universal Link.

When the value of result.resultStatus is S and the value of vaultingStatus is PROCESSING, one or more of the following URLs may be returned: schemeUrl, applinkUrl, and normalUrl.
applinkUrl.descriptionLake:
The URL that redirects users to open an app when the target app is installed, or to open a WAP page when the target app is not installed. For Android, the URL is a Native App Link. For iOS, the URL is a Universal Link.

When the value of result.resultStatus is S and the value of vaultingStatus is PROCESSING, one or more of the following URLs may be returned: schemeUrl, applinkUrl, and normalUrl.

paymentMethodType.description: The type of payment method to be vaulted. The value of this parameter is fixed to CARD.
paymentMethodType.descriptionLake: The type of payment method to be vaulted. The value of this parameter is fixed to CARD.

cardToken.description: The token of the card. The value of this parameter is used by paymentMethodId in the pay API when initiating payments.
cardToken.descriptionLake: The token of the card. The value of this parameter is used by paymentMethodId in the pay API when initiating payments.

brand.description: The name of the card brand. See the Card brand list to check the valid values.
brand.descriptionLake: The name of the card brand. See the Card brand list to check the valid values.

maskedCardNo.description: The masked card number, showing only a few digits and hiding the rest.
maskedCardNo.descriptionLake: The masked card number, showing only a few digits and hiding the rest.

card.description:
The card information.

This parameter is returned when the value of paymentMethodType is CARD and the value of vaultingStatus is SUCCESS.
card.descriptionLake:
The card information.

This parameter is returned when the value of paymentMethodType is CARD and the value of vaultingStatus is SUCCESS.

paymentMethodDetail.description:
The details about the payment method that needs to be vaulted.

This parameter is returned when the value of vaultingStatus is SUCCESS.
paymentMethodDetail.descriptionLake:
The details about the payment method that needs to be vaulted.

This parameter is returned when the value of vaultingStatus is SUCCESS.

vaultingStatus.description:
Indicates the payment method's vaulting status. Valid values are:

  • SUCCESS: indicates that the vaulting is successful. 
  • FAIL: indicates that the vaulting failed.
  • PROCESSING: indicates that the vaulting is under process. 

This parameter is returned when the value of result.resultStatus is S.
vaultingStatus.descriptionLake:
Indicates the payment method's vaulting status. Valid values are:

  • SUCCESS: indicates that the vaulting is successful. 
  • FAIL: indicates that the vaulting failed.
  • PROCESSING: indicates that the vaulting is under process. 

This parameter is returned when the value of result.resultStatus is S.

x-result.message: The vaulting request ID does not exist.
x-result.action: Check whether the value of vaultingRequestId is correct. If it is correct, contact Alipay Technical Support for specific reasons.
x-result.actionLake: Check whether the value of vaultingRequestId is correct. If it is correct, contact Alipay Technical Support for specific reasons.

x-result.message: An API call has failed, which is caused by unknown reasons.
x-result.action: Call the interface again to resolve the issue. If not resolved, contact Alipay Technical Support.
x-result.actionLake: Call the interface again to resolve the issue. If not resolved, contact Alipay Technical Support.

post.x-more:
Result process logic

For different request results, different actions must be taken. The possible responses for result.resultStatus are:

  • S: indicates the API call succeeded. You can get the vaulting result from vaultingStatus in the API response.
  • F: indicates the API call failed. For more information on why the call failed, see result.resultCode.
  • U: indicates the API call failed due to an unknown reason. Retry using the same request ID.
post.x-more-lake:
Result process logic

For different request results, different actions must be taken. The possible responses for result.resultStatus are:

  • S: indicates the API call succeeded. You can get the vaulting result from vaultingStatus in the API response.
  • F: indicates the API call failed. For more information on why the call failed, see result.resultCode.
  • U: indicates the API call failed due to an unknown reason. Retry using the same request ID.
